name: steeplejack-mysql
description: A MySQL strategy for Steeplejack projects

scripts.buildAll: npm run clean && tsc --outDir ./tmp --sourceMap --experimentalDecorators index.ts test/**/*.ts
scripts.clean: rm -Rf index.js lib/*.js index.js.map lib/*.js.map index.d.ts lib/*.d.ts tmp coverage
scripts.coverage: npm run buildAll && rm -Rf ./coverage && istanbul cover _mocha ./tmp/test/ -- --recursive ./tmp/test && remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage.json -o ./coverage/lcov-report -t html&& remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage.json -o ./coverage/coverage.json  && istanbul check-coverage ./coverage/coverage.json --statements=100 --functions=100 --branches=100 --lines=100
scripts.mocha: npm run buildAll && mocha --require source-map-support/register --recursive tmp/test/unit
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha

author: Simon Emms <simon@simonemms.com>
